entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to get `FileVersionInfo` data from exe #110235
  • Nullable JsonDocument property will deserialized to JsonValueKind.Null instead of null #110231
  • Move arithmetic DivideByZero and Overflow exceptions to JIT on 32-bit platforms #110226
    10.0.0
  • Unnecessary Slow Aligned Memory Reallocation (Multiple of System Page Size) #110225
  • Performance regression with System.Numerics.Vector when retargeting from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110223
  • Loading PFX without admin causes CryptographicException #110217
  • [API Proposal]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis equivalent of JetBrains.Annotations.MeansImplicitUseAttribute/UsedImplicitlyAttribute #110215
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http is not being copied #110213
  • Could the division codegen be improved on ARM64? #110212
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/tailcalls_do/tailcalls_do.cmd #110210

Closed

  • Potential Deadlock When Disposing EventListeners Concurrently #96219
  • Error: AOT Support throws the error "PublishTrimmed is implied by native compilation and cannot be disabled". #109452
    Future
  • Equivalent crypto support across platforms #110220
  • Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} does not check the length of destination correct #109807
  • Error restoring WebAPI project using .NET 9 #110201
  • SPMI: superpmi-collect consistently fails to fully collect crossgen2 scenarios #88423
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Collections.IterateForEach<String> #106342
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: NullReferenceException in Internal.JitInterface.CorInfoImpl._beginInlining #105441
    9.0.0
  • A mechanism for specifying alignment on a field or struct should be supported. #22990
  • [System.Runtime.InteropServices] Introduce broader platform definitions. #25172
  • Extensions.Hosting 9.0.0 - AOT - Method not found: Void System.Text.Json.Serialization.Metadata.JsonObjectInfoValues #110214
  • Part of the address disappears during the execution of the request #110202
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 11/18/2024 8:23:46 PM #110193
  • Variant Interop Bug (RuntimeBinder) #36354

PullRequests

Created

  • Add `TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(long)` overload #110234
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 10.0.0
  • Add winget to windows-requirements.md #110233
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][interp] Properly handle exceptions thrown by mono_marshal_get_native_wrapper #110232
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Provide more info on the failing CustomAttributeProvider #110230
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #110228
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Remove `fgRenumberBlocks` calls in loop opt phases #110227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.x
  • JIT: Allow strength reducing to GCD of IVs #110222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Use JS interop to get full `NativeName`, `DisplayName` #110221
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix increment in decreasing loop in non-shipping code #110219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove references to "CSE candidate" in morph #110218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix Configuration to throw with ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration option #110209
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Test all three custom host headers #110208
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add New "Area-Type-System-And-Startup" Github Group to Area Owners Doc #110200
    area-Meta
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix length check for Convert.TryToHexString{Lower} #109891
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Fixes and fuzzing improvements #110194
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 131.0.6778.85, windows: 131.0.6778.86 #110114
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix Matrix4x4.CreateReflection when D is not zero #110162
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0-staging] DATAS BGC thread synchronization fix #110174
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.1

Updated

  • Add a feature flag to not use GVM in Linq Select #109978
    area-System.Linq, size-reduction, community-contribution
  • [draft] Improve startup and warmup performance for invoke by reducing emit usage #109901
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 10.0.0
  • Allow optimizing mask conversions on x64 as well #110195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Fix compilation crashes when type load exception is generated in code #110078
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.x
  • [mono][sgen] Add separate card mark function to be used with debug #109698
    area-GC-mono
  • JIT: enable cloning of try regions #110020
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MT][Firefox] Disable multithreading tests on Firefox #110155
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak `EncodeToUtf16_Vector128` #110203
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix stubs for `HybridGlobalization` #110183
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, linkable-framework, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix hostfxr.h to be valid C again. #110060
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 9.0.1

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Double check OSR in async2 struct instance methods #2814

Closed

  • [RuntimeAsync] Support runtime-async instance methods on structs #2766

PullRequests

Updated

  • [RuntimeAsync] Keep `LoaderAllocator` objects alive from continuations #2812
    area-async
  • [SwiftBindings] Describe protocol constraints #2811
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added support for size, stride, alignment, and the value witness table #2813
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inconsistent dotnet build behaviour between configurations #45200
  • [Aspire] dotnet watch does not refresh browser after rude edit & restart #45197
  • Remove support for DotNetCliToolReference #45193
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet watch crashes upon adding static files #45183
  • After migrating from .NET 8 to .NET 9, the application crashes when I send a request to the CoreWCF server from a .NET 9 client application. #45182
  • enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_ProjectType and revert framework targetting #45181
  • [BUG] . NET9.0 Blazor Web App cannot allow cross domain websites to display nested iframe tags #45172

Closed

  • Get process ID of a .NET Core process through .NET CLI #19193
    Backlog
  • Collection was modified in SdkResolverService.ResolveSdkUsingResolversWithPatternsFirst #45168

PullRequests

Created

  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.SolutionPersistence: 1.0.23 -> 1.0.26 #45199
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • VMR: Set outputParentDirectory for 1ES outputs #45198
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump darc #45186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45171
    untriaged
  • Wait for project changes when unchanged project doesn't build #45167
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix TargetRid for Mono CrossAOT Alpine arm64 build #45194
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor] Fix hot reload for components with collocated JS files #45120
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • VMR: Move Final Join job into vmr-build.yml and only run it if vertical build passed #45178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding Microsoft.Testing.Platform dependencies #45180
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix win-x86 windowsdesktop and aspnetcore builds #45162
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Add verticals for Linux/Windows NativeAOT runtime packs #45154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Factor Hot Reload agent implementation into a source package #44899
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use temp directory as TestExecutionDirectory in RunTestsOnHelix.sh #45022
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add hook for importing .props file after .NET SDK props #45151
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Move test templates to SDK repo #44417
    Area-DotNet Test, Area-Templates
  • Enable tests following the net10 transition #44931
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect apphost being used when publishing for self-contained single-file with `NoBuild=true` #45159
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Re-enable scenario-tests execution in VMR #45109
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Initial attempt at removing explicit #nullable enable in source #44936
    untriaged
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2590512 #44765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Refresh browser for all transitively referencing projects #45096
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore, Area-Watch
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Add support for `dotnet sln add file` and `dotnet sln add folder` #45072
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InterceptableLocation.GetDisplayLocation breaks determistic build #76126
  • Collapse usings on file open doesn't apply when the usings was manually expanded previously #76117
  • The default #if code snippet always insert white space end of $selected$ #76116
    17.13
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The solution does not contain the specified document, causes IDE and CLI errors #76115
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in SyntaxNode.FindNode when writing invalid for loop #76114
  • .NET Framework: "IDE0059: Remove unnecessary value assignment" is incorrectly shown when assigning value in an is operator and variable is used in a nameof. #76113
  • Area - Sync Namespace #76110

Closed

  • Intellisense References not showing correctly when using a Primary-Constructor #73469
    17.13
  • Re-enable `.. x ? [y] : []` support in features once supported in the language #70172
    Backlog
  • IDE0031 doesn't account for "is not null" #76093
    Backlog
  • Infallible var pattern causes "not all code paths return a value" #76059
  • 'DiagnosticSuppressor' doesn't work at all when targeting IDEXXXX diagnostics #76111
  • Need help to support target runtime "linux-loongarch64" #76065
    Backlog
  • Show autocompletion for implementing the methods of an interface that have default implementations #75689
  • `dotnet_analyzer_diagnostic.category-Naming.severity` does not apply to naming rule violations #74901
  • Crash when trying to create a netmodule reference during P2P conversion #72183

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude starting symbol when going to implementations if we find implementations #76125
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add a dedicated fixer to fixup code in expression trees that is now calling restricted apis #76124
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add initial runtime async spike #76121
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • When converting to raw strings, do not change \r\n sequences if not explicitly requested by the user #76120
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Backport #75907 to release/dev17.12 #76119
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add support for 'find refs' finding references to 'dynamic' #76118
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Document approach for compiler-recognized attributes and LangVersion #76112
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged

Merged

  • Flatten SourceMethodSymbol hierarchy #76107
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bump versions of dependencies coming from maintenance-packages #76076
    Area-Infrastructure, Blocked, untriaged, Next
  • Update config data for 17.13P2 snap of VS #76088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Expose FAR to cohosting #76002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • VBOverloadResolutionPriority: clone remaining C# tests for the feature #76127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Razor DynamicFile Provider #76050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add option for LSP-based auto insert #75224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Honour users' settings as a starting point for Razor formatting #76066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Onboard C# advanced pages to unified settings #75493
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix incorrect codespit of xml doc comments #76108
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add feature flag for emitting string literals into data section as UTF8 #76036
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Set state of enumerator object to "after" during disposal #76090
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary EOL package references #76073
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing temps whose refs might be captured #76009
    Area-Compilers
  • Use partial analysis results to filter out analyzers that need to be executed. #76062
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nuget package injects global usings #59209
  • Consider deprecating `Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Client` package #59208
  • Blazor Streaming Not Working #59206
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #59205
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop #59204
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59203
  • Hosting bundle do not uninstall old dotnet version #59202
  • [Blazor] <details> @ontoggle should support 2-way binding #59200
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, json #59192
  • [Blazor] Cannot use RenderMode in Generic BaseComponent #59190

Closed

  • Building the managed part without node installed doesn't work anymore #59114
    10.0-preview1
  • Razor class library doesn't add associated Js file generated by typescript. #59188
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58774
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, updates #59147
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-generation, fortunes_dapper, https #59178
  • Blazor Pre-rendering and PersistingComponentStateSubscription not working correctly with dotnet 9 with InteractiveServer mode? #59198
  • Add EventSource/EventCounter tracing and metrics for Authentication #4665
    Backlog
  • CSS isolation isn't working because the css is added in the wrong order #59186
  • Blazor prerender + WASM - form submission handler execution #59193
  • Blazor WASM not supported from Microsoft.SemanticKernel.PromptTemplates.Handlebars from version >= 1.16 #59173
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #59158
  • Consider a "standalone" SignalR backplane solution #5281
    Backlog
  • 8.0 Helix matrix failing to find JDK #59177
    8.0.12
  • Improve repo development experience on VS Code and VS4Mac #27260
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix: Handle null event.submitter in enhanced form submission #59207
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Prevent ArgumentOutOfRangeException when handling nested generic types #59201
    area-mvc, community-contribution, feature-openapi
  • Change OpenAPI document name resolution to be case-insensitive #59199
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks, area-minimal
  • Update README.md #59191
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Fix IIS outofprocess to remove WebSocket compression handshake #58931
    Servicing-approved, area-networking, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] Fix SignalR Java POM to include description #58896
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.1
  • Fix source build when using `--no-build-js` #59118
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `1204d63` to `d144031` #59033
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.12
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `d144031` #59032
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0] Harden parsing of [Range] attribute values #59077
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 9.0.1
  • Avoid flakiness in template tests around URL validity checking #59195
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1
  • Set target platform for wixproj and vcxproj correctly #59194
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Add direct reference to System.Drawing.Common in tools #59189
    area-commandlinetools, tell-mode, 9.0.1
  • Add direct reference to System.Runtime.Caching in tools #59187
    area-commandlinetools, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Fix java discovery in helix-matrix #59181
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.12

Updated

  • [LoongArch64]: Enable the crossgen2 tool to optimize aspnetcore runtime #59131
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add WebAssemblyHotReloadCapabilities msbuild property #59094
    area-blazor, 9.0.x
  • Put package assets in TFM-specific folder #58995
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Get localization lcl translations handback working #26176
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Add new templates to localization #26175
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Fancy Sample Code Uses Copyrighted Fonts #26173
  • Add Localization Tests #26172
    Backlog
  • CarouselView iOS crash when swiping to 2nd carousel page - Index was out of range / System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26171
  • [iOS] Investigate if MauiCALayer needs to use a weakreference for the IShape #26169
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • FileSystem.OpenAppPackageFileAsync(string) throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException on Android 14 #26167
  • InitializeComponent throws System.IO.FileNotFoundException #26166
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar overrides tabbar title with page title. #26165
  • MAUI 9 Shell Tabbar does not work on iOS with more than 5 tabs #26164
  • Update System.Formats.Asn1 #26162
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] Not rendering ImageButton Stroke #26159
  • SelectionLength Property Not Applied to Entry at Runtime #26158
  • Button sizing broken by .NET9 when using the Mac UI Idiom #26154
  • Label display bug #26151
  • CollectionView GroupHeaderTemplate controls inside incorrectly show/hide after reusing dataTemplate #26150
  • The Shell FlyoutIcon foreground color is not applied on the Windows platform. #26148
  • HttpClient GET Api is failing with {System.IO.IOException: Connection reset ---> Java.Net.SocketException: Connection reset error in .NET MAUI Android #26147
  • Navigation - Shell TabBar Doesnt render Content when navigating from and then back to it #26144

Closed

  • [Android] [Maps] Fatal exception after pushing modal page to navigation stack #20187
    Backlog
  • Android Crash ImageSource Glyph #26156
  • [.NET 9] Shell Flyout menu not rendering after navigating from a MenuItem page #25436
    .NET 9 SR2
  • PointerGestureRecognizer is not working at all on droid #26149
  • [IOS] Dotnet 9 Memory leaks: BindableLayout leaks if nested inside a CollectionView, CarouselView ...etc #26042
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [NET9] iOS Run Templates on NET9 are failing #24236
    .NET 9 SR2
  • ControlTemplate not propagating the BindingContext correctly if set through Binding #22607
    Backlog
  • Binding Context on Content View #14919
    Backlog
  • BindingContext Not Propagated Correctly to ContentView When ControlTemplate Changes at Runtime #25934
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Content Page Can Not Extend Edge To Fullscreen When Using Translucent NavigationBar #15989

PullRequests

Created

  • Add three templates to locproject.json #26178
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Change Yaml to use OneLocTool to create PR after we receive the lcl files #26177
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10628913 #26174
  • [ci] See if we can provision by default on devdiv #26170
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 21 #26168
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [nuget] Update System.Formats.Asn1 #26163
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Added tests to validate the ItemsUpdatingScrollMode property in CarouselView #26160
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, area-testing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed CollectionViewHandler2 null reference exception if ItemsLayout is set for Tablet but NOT Phone #26152
    community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Make MauiAppCompatEditText public #26146
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Tweener leak on Animation #26143
    area-animation, community ✨, memory-leak 💦
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 20 #26142
    area-testing, community ✨

Merged

  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, p/0, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Make sure to unsubscribe from LayoutChanged on CV #26138
    .NET 9 SR1.2
  • Always propagate the BC to the ControlTemplate #26072
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr1] Make sure to unsubscribe from LayoutChanged on CV #26139

Updated

  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/1, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR2
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header/footer - fix #25960
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Disable HitTest when showing EmptyView on CollectionView #26006
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [XC] Add file info to exception reports #25359
    area-xaml, p/0, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Reseting thumb image #26085
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • [Testing] Fix randomly failing tests on CI #26120
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable value type used with coalescing operator in argument to non-nullable aggregate function throws #35227
  • RelationalQueryableMethodTranslatingExpressionVisitor now accepts RelationalQueryCompilationContext and not QueryCompilationContext #35226
  • Cosmos: EF Core 9 fails to find document with '|' character in it's id #35224
  • EF Core Sqlite - Migration doesn't apply configuration when [NotMapped] property is added to one of the DbSets #35223
  • EF9 InMemory database causes InvalidOperationException when calling RelationalTypeBaseExtensions.GetTableMappings() #35220
  • NullReferenceException when trying to optimize a DbContext with --nativeaot #35219

Closed

  • Could not load type AdHocMapper after upgrading from 8 to 9 #35179
  • PendingModelChangesWarning exception thrown when upgrading to .NET 9 #35158
  • How to turn off protection against concurrent migrations #35186
  • Cosmos: Min/Max/Average over nullable value type throws on no data #35094
    9.0.1
  • `_sqlAliasManager` unexpectedly `null` in `SelectExpression.PushdownIntoSubquery()` call after previous call of `SelectExpression.Update()` #35192
  • InvalidOperationException: An error was generated for warning 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Migrations.PendingModelChangesWarning': The model for context 'ApplicationDbContext' has pending changes #35191

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35228
    Servicing-consider
  • Temporary fix for DropTable/CreateTable issue around temporal tables #35225
  • [release/9.0] Prevent owner entity from becoming optional #35222
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/9.0] Add more specific messages when pending model changes are detected #35221
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35212 - Query/Perf: Compile identifier lambdas passed to PopulateIncludeCollection rather than inline #35217
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Return null when the type is nullable for Cosmos Max/Min/Average #35216
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Enable Cosmos vector search on EF9 #35183
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35208 - Query/Perf: don't compile liftable constant resolvers in interpretation mode #35211
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35206 - Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer lambdas when constructing shaper with PopulateCollection #35207
    Servicing-approved, 9.0.x

Updated

  • Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35177
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35193
